Detailed Description

BtDeviceFilter is used to define a condition that can be used to check a BtDevice whether it maches that condition or not. The BtDevice can be checked against the major device class, minor device class, the service class and the device state.

Member Function Documentation

const BtDeviceAndServiceClass & BtDeviceFilter::GetDeviceAndServiceClass (   )  const
 

Get the device and service class of this filter.

GetDeviceAndSericeClass returns the filter condition used by this filter affecting the device and service class.

Returns:
A reference to a BtDeviceAndServiceClass that is used as filter condition of this filter.

BtDeviceAndServiceClass & BtDeviceFilter::GetDeviceAndServiceClass (   ) 
 

Get the device and service class of this filter.

GetDeviceAndSericeClass returns the filter condition used by this filter affecting the device and service class.

Returns:
A reference to a BtDeviceAndServiceClass that is used as filter condition of this filter.

BtDeviceState BtDeviceFilter::GetDeviceState (   )  const
 

Get the device state of this filter.

GetDeviceState returns the filter condition used by this filter.affecting the device state (known, paired, and so on).

Returns:
A BtDeviceState that is used as filter condition for this filter.

BOOLEAN BtDeviceFilter::Matches (  const BtDevice &  device  )  const [virtual]
 

Does a device match this filters condition.

Matches tests a BtDevice whether it matches this filter or not. This function is virtual because derived class must extend this function to test against the device state of the BtDevice.

Parameters:
device A reference to a BtDevice that should be tested against the filter condition.
Returns:
TRUE: The passed BtDevice matches the filter condition.
FALSE: The passed BtDevice does not match the filter condition.

void BtDeviceFilter::SetDeviceAndServiceClass (  const BtDeviceAndServiceClass &  device_and_service_class  ) 
 

Set the device and service class for this filter.

SetDeviceAndServiceClass sets the filter condition used by this filter affecting the device and service class.

Returns:
A reference to a BtDeviceAndServiceClass that should be used as filter condition of this filter.

void BtDeviceFilter::SetDeviceState (  BtDeviceState  device_state  ) 
 

Set the device state for this filter.

SetDeviceState sets the filter condition used by this filter.affecting the device state (known paired and so on).

Returns:
A BtDeviceState that should be used as filter condition of this filter.
